This page is to collect statements and definitions of transhumanism, for the purpose of eventually creating our own transhumanist declaration.

The Mormon Transhumanist Affirmation

“Transhumanism is the ethical use of technology to extend human ability, and to improve the human condition.”

“Christian Transhumanism is simply the biblical view of humanity, as made in the image of God.”

“Christian Transhumanism affirms the potential and hope of continually transforming the human condition through growth in compassion, creativity, and innovation.”

“Christian Transhumanism pursues radical thriving towards the improvement of the human condition through intellectual, technological, and spiritual progress.”

“Christian Transhumanism believes that human progress, learning, growth, science, morality, and compassion are not opposed but are ultimately one pursuit.”
